>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

You’ve trained in ancient gladiatorial arts that make use of nets. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.Su8kKW419Y4he8Qk]{Special Weapon Proficiency} feat with @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.xpVfO5T7nFd3SLOH]{Nyfiber net} as a bonus feat. You can @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.MBNI94tbMoqizPUk]{Trick Attack (Ex)} with this weapon. You don’t add trick damage to your attack, but the target is still @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-Footed}, and you can use debilitating tricks. At level 6, the DC for a creature to escape your nyfiber net using Acrobatics or Strength becomes 10 + your operative level + your Dexterity modifier.
